import { useContext } from "react" import CurrentUserContext from "../contexts/CurrentUserContext" export default function Card({ cards, onCardClick, onDeletePlace }) { const currentUser = useContext(CurrentUserContext) return (
onCardClick(cards)} alt = {`Изображение ${cards.name}`} />

{cards.name}

{cards.owner._id === currentUser._id &&
) }
